name: Popup Dungeon - A Tabletop Inspired Video Game
blurb: A roguelike papercraft RPG that lets you create any weapon, ability, enemy, or hero imaginable. Blends the best of video & board games.

rewards.reward: No Reward

--- The Crawler ---
*Steam key to Popup Dungeon, including Early Access. Help shape the course of development!
[AND]
* EXCLUSIVE in-game Charm: "The Crowd Source"

--- The Runner ---\r\nAll previous rewards plus:\r\n* A Steam key to Triple.B.Title's debut game, Ring Runner: Flight of the Sages, an action-packed space shooter RPG. DELIVERED IMMEDIATELY (upon successful funding).

--- The Bard ---
All previous rewards plus:
* A CD-quality, digital download of the Popup Dungeon soundtrack.
[AND]
* A CD-quality, digital download of the Ring Runner soundtrack. DELIVERED IMMEDIATELY (upon successful funding).
--- Life of the Party ---\r\nAll previous rewards plus:\r\n* An extra Popup Dungeon Steam key to share with a friend. It's dangerous to go alone!

--- The Juror ---
All previous rewards plus:
* Access to development polls. You decide which tile sets, characters, enemies, weapons, and challenges we make!
[AND]
*Forum Avatars: Your favorite PUD characters, transfixed and transformed into forum avatars for your judicious use.

--- The Scholar ---
All previous rewards plus:
* Digitally signed, high quality PDF art book, containing printable props and characters. Use our papercraft in your table top games!
[AND]
* Ring Runner: Derelict Dreams, a full length Sci Fi novel by Triple.B.Titles, packed with action, humor, and questionable science! DELIVERED IMMEDIATELY (upon successful funding).

--- The Knight ---
All previous rewards plus:
* Hat Pack. Think Box Cat needs a top hat? Maybe a tiara for the Proud Dwarf? Be a man of many hats and impress your suitors with this fun hat pack. You shall receive no less than half a dozen hats for every occasion, at least 1 of which shall be EXCLUSIVE to Kickstarter backers.
[AND]
* Super-powered version of the Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE in-game Charm: "The Crowd Source." Gain an edge in battle that every Knight deserves.
AND
* You may add a "Sir" or "Lady" in front of your name in real life (at your own social peril).

--- The Fellowship --- [NEW] All previous rewards plus an additional 4 copies of Popup Dungeon for a TOTAL OF 6! That's enough copies for an entire party and a Dungeon Master. A great way to start a party!

--- The Judge ---
All previous rewards plus:
* Get your name in Popup Dungeon's credits under "Patrons."
[AND]
* Not only can you vote on all matters of development, but you can also suggest ideas for weapons, enemies, characters, and tile sets for the Jury to vote on.

--- Sensei ---\r\n* Become a GAME DEVELOPER! Work with Triple.B.Titles to create an ability for our Kickstarter Man super hero, AKA "The Crowd." With the power of Crowd Source Funding, "The Crowd" can do anything!\r\nPlayers will be able to choose from the list of submitted abilities to create their very own version of "The Crowd."

--- Conquistador ---\r\nAll previous rewards plus:\r\n* SUPER TOP SECRET MEGA EXCLUSIVE EARLY ACCESS. Get in on the ground floor and join the adventure during early-stage alpha. (Warning: Only for the bold of spirit!)

--- Lord ---
All previous rewards plus:
* Be credited as a "Lord," and add a short message to accompany your name in the credits.
[AND]
* DLC for Life: Let the serfs do the work. You will receive all major DLC packs we ever create for Popup Dungeon for the rest of eternity.

--- The Armorer --- [NEW]\r\n All previous rewards <except> instead of creating an ability for Kickstarter Man, you may immortalize yourself in a PIECE OF ARMOR. You can choose to create a helmet, chest piece, boots, or gloves. Tell us what kind of bonuses you'd like for your item to have, and we'll work with you to make it happen. The item will be considered a relic and bear YOUR NAME if you wish. It will be included in the actual release of the game, so everyone will get to see and use it. This is a KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE!

--- The Smith ---
All previous rewards <except> instead of creating an ability for Kickstarter Man, you may immortalize yourself in an item by helping us create an entirely NEW WEAPON TYPE. Upgraded versions of this weapon will BEAR YOUR NAME.
[AND]
* Join the GOLDEN TABLE CLUB: receive a Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, in-game, golden table texture upon which all your Popup Dungeon games can be played with the due class and sophistication that you rightly deserve and only digital gold can provide.

--- The Doctor ---
All previous rewards <except> instead of creating an ability for Kickstarter Man or a weapon, you can help us create a NEW ENEMY TYPE, with up to 5 unique abilities! You can name it, tell us what it should look like, and even determine its behavior.
[AND]
* Join the GOLDEN TABLE CLUB: receive a Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, in-game, golden table texture upon which all your Popup Dungeon games can be played with the due class and sophistication that you rightly deserve and only digital gold can provide.

--- The Doctor --- [UPGRADED]
All previous rewards <except> instead of creating an ability for Kickstarter Man or a weapon, you can help us create a NEW ENEMY TYPE, with 3 UNIQUE ABILITIES! You can name it, tell us what it should look like, and even determine its behavior. This enemy is included in the actual release of the game; everyone gets to see and fight it!
[AND] 
A large, high-quality print of your enemy on cardstock, autographed by the whole Triple.B.Titles team, ready for you to frame. And another page of smaller versions also on cardstock for you to cut out and use in your table top games. (Total of 2 prints) You also get digital versions of these files so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever! 
[AND]
A personal video of the entire Triple.B.Titles team thanking you for your support and displaying your enemy prints before they’re mailed to you.
[AND]
* Join the GOLDEN TABLE CLUB: receive a Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, in-game, golden table texture upon which all your Popup Dungeon games can be played with the due class and sophistication that you rightly deserve and only digital gold can provide.

--- The Progenitor ---
All previous rewards <except> instead of creating an ability for Kickstarter Man, a weapon, or enemy, you can create an entirely NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTER. This character will be included and playable in the release version of the game. You tell us what they look like, choose every aspect of their stats and characteristics, design up to 10 UNIQUE ABILITIES and even create a WEAPON TYPE if you'd like. Upgraded versions of this weapon will BEAR YOUR NAME.
[AND]
* Join the GOLDEN TABLE CLUB: receive a Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, in-game, golden table texture upon which all your Popup Dungeon games can be played with the due class and sophistication that you rightly deserve and only digital gold can provide.

--- The Progenitor --- [UPGRADED]
All previous rewards <except> instead of creating an ability for Kickstarter Man or an enemy, you can create an entirely NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTER. This character will be included and playable in the release version of the game; everyone gets to see and use it! You tell us what they look like, choose every aspect of their stats and characteristics, design up to 10 UNIQUE ABILITIES and even create a WEAPON TYPE if you'd like. Upgraded versions of this weapon will BEAR YOUR NAME.
[AND] 
2 HIGH-QUALITY PRINTS of your custom character on cardstock, both AUTOGRAPHED by the whole Triple.B.Titles team; frame one and build the other! You also get a digital version of this file so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever! Plus 1 HIGH-QUALITY PRINT of your customized weapon on cardstock; cut it out and equip it on your character! (3 Prints total) You also get a digital version of this file so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever! 
[AND] 
In addition to a character, design a Charm! There's currently no plan to allow user-creation of CHARMS, so this is a truly UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY. Decide what bonus the CHARM will impart, how it will look, and, of course, its name.
[AND]
A personal video of the entire Triple.B.Titles team thanking you for your support and displaying your character prints before they’re mailed to you.
[AND]
* Join the GOLDEN TABLE CLUB: receive a Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, in-game, golden table texture upon which all your Popup Dungeon games can be played with the due class and sophistication that you rightly deserve and only digital gold can provide.

--- The Bannerman --- [NEW]
All previous rewards <except> instead of creating an ability for Kickstarter Man or an enemy, you can create not 1, but 5 NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTERS - that’s an entire party! Each character also includes a CUSTOM WEAPON and 5 UNIQUE ABILITIES that you design with us! Upgraded versions of this weapon will BEAR YOUR NAME. These characters, weapons, and abilities are included in the actual release of the game; everyone gets to see and use them!
[AND]
2 HIGH-QUALITY PRINTS of each of your 5 characters on cardstock, both AUTOGRAPHED by the whole Triple.B.Titles team; frame one and build the other! You also get digital versions of this file so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever! HIGH-QUALITY PRINTS of each of your custom weapons on cardstock; cut them out and equip them on your characters! (That’s a total of 15 prints!) You also get digital versions of these files so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever. 
[AND]
In addition to your party of characters, design a Charm! There's currently no plan to allow user-creation of CHARMS, so this is a truly UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY. Decide what bonus the CHARM will impart, how it will look, and, of course, its name.
[AND]
A personal video of the entire Triple.B.Titles team thanking you for your support and displaying your character prints before they’re mailed to you.
[AND]
* Join the GOLDEN TABLE CLUB: receive a Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, in-game, golden table texture upon which all your Popup Dungeon games can be played with the due class and sophistication that you rightly deserve and only digital gold can provide.

--- The Wizard --- [UPGRADED]
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS, except instead of just creating a party of adventurers, you can BE THE WIZARD, and choose an ENTIRE TILE SET for us to develop. Perhaps you'd like to dungeoneer in your office, or maybe you're a steam punk fan, or you've always dreamed of raiding a luxury star ship's bridge, or maybe you're envisioning something entirely different! The choice is yours. This tier also comes with a pack of 12 ENEMIES that will be themed to your chosen tile set, and your own CUSTOM PLAYABLE CHARACTER and WEAPON. * You will also be CREDITED as THE WIZARD in Popup Dungeon's credits. (THERE CAN BE ONLY ONE "THE WIZARD")
[AND]
2 HIGH-QUALITY PRINTS of your custom character on cardstock, both AUTOGRAPHED by the whole Triple.B.Titles team; frame one and build the other! You also get a digital version of this file so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever! 1 HIGH-QUALITY PRINT of your customized weapon on cardstock; cut it out and equip it on your character! You also get a digital version of this file so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever! Large, HIGH-QUALITY PRINTS of each of your 12 enemies on cardstock, autographed by the whole Triple.B.Titles team, ready for you to frame. Each enemy also includes an additional page of smaller versions also on cardstock for you to cut out and use in your table top games. (A total of 27 PRINTS in all!) You also get digital versions of these files so you can print as many and in any size that you’d like whenever.
[AND]
In addition to your Tile Set, Enemies, and character, design a Charm! There's currently no plan to allow user-creation of CHARMS, so this is a truly UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY. Decide what bonus the CHARM will impart, how it will look, and, of course, its name.
[AND]
A series of PERSONAL VIDEO UPDATES from the Triple.B.Titles team showing you our progress on your Tile Set, enemies, and character. You get to stay up to date and involved at every step of the development process. 
[AND]
* Join the GOLDEN TABLE CLUB: receive a Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, in-game, golden table texture upon which all your Popup Dungeon games can be played with the due class and sophistication that you rightly deserve and only digital gold can provide.
